name: Brightest Night
text: You grant low-light vision to the affected creatures. Creatures that already have low-light vision have their existing lowlight vision enhanced so that they can see four times as far in conditions of dim light. Creatures within 10 feet of someone under the effects of brightest night do not gain concealment from dim light.
target_zh: 一个自愿生物，加上每3等级一个额外自愿生物，两两之间的距离不得超过30尺
text_zh: 你使受影响的生物获得昏暗视觉。对已拥有昏暗视觉的生物而言，他们原有的昏暗视觉会被强化，使他们可以在昏暗光照的状况中看到四倍远的距离。在受至明之夜效果影响者附近10尺的生物不会因昏暗光照而获得隐蔽效果。
